summary: A young Boston writer goes back in time into an era where wizards and dragon reign and science is just barely known.
cast: Victor Buono|James Gregory|James Earl Jones|Harry Morgan|John Ritter|Larry Storch|Don Messick|Bob McFadden|Ed Peck|Jack Lester|Alexandra Stoddart|Nellie Bellflower|Cosie Costa|Paul Frees|Don McLean
director: Directors: Jules Bass, Arthur Rankin Jr.
title: El vuelo de los dragones
